MICRO
m00 0000000000011100001100000001000111010111//SW+0->PC,MAR//BOOTSTRAP
m01 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m02 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//LDA$K,X
m03 0000000000010100000101000000000011011101//MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m04 0000000000011100001100001000000110011101//MDR+0->ACC
m05 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m06 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m07 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//LDX#K
m08 0000000000011100001100000100000110011101//MDR+0->X
m09 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m0a 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m0b 0000000000010100001101000100010110111110//X+1->X//INX
m0c 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m0e 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//CMPX#Y
m0f 0000000000010100100101000000001110111101//X-MDR,NOP,MSTATUS
m10 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m11 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m12 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//STA$K,X
m13 0000000000010100000101000000000011011101//MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m14 0000000000010000000110000000000000011111//ACC+0->NOP,MWE~
m15 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m16 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m17 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//ADC$K,X
m18 0000000000010100000101000000000111011101//MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m19 0000000000010100001110001000000110111001//MDR+ACC->ACC,CARRYE~,MSTATUS
m1a 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m1b 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m1c 0000000000011100000100000000010010111110//1+0->NOP,MSTATUS//CRC
m1d 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m1e 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m1f 0001101101110100001100010001011111011110//(IFZ=0)->(JUMP+3)&&PC++//BRNZ$K
m20 0000000000011100001100000001000111011101//MDR+0->PC,MAR
m21 0000000000000100000100000000000110001111//NEXT(PC)
m22 0000000000010100001100010001011111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m23 0000000000000100000100000000000110001111//NEXT(PC)
m24 0000000000010000011110001000000110011111//ACC+0->LEFTSHIFT,ACC//SHLA
m25 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m26 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
m27 0000000000010000001100010001000111011110//PC+0->PC,MAR//HALT
m28 0000000000000000000100000000000010001111//NEXT(PC)
MAPPER
m00 02//LDA$K,X
m01 07//LDX#K
m02 0b//INX
m03 0e//CMPX#Y
m04 12//STA$K,X
m05 17//ADC$K,X
m06 1c//CRC
m07 1f//BRNZ$K
m08 24//SHLA
m09 27//HALT
MAIN
m00 01//LDX#K
m01 00//operand
m02 00//LDA$K,X
m03 12//operand
m04 08//SHLA
m05 06//CRC
m06 05//ADC$K,X
m07 1b//operand
m08 04//STA$K,X
m09 24//operand
m0a 02//INX
m0b 03//CMPX#Y
m0c 08//operand
m0d 07//BRNZ$K
m0e 02//operand
m0f 09//HALT
m12 01//Z[0]
m13 02//Z[1]
m14 03//Z[2]
m15 04//Z[3]
m16 05//Z[4]
m17 06//Z[5]
m18 07//Z[6]
m19 08//Z[7]
m1b 08//Y[0]
m1c 07//Y[1]
m1d 06//Y[2]
m1e 05//Y[3]
m1f 04//Y[4]
m20 03//Y[5]
m21 02//Y[6]
m22 01//Y[7]
m24 00//W[0]
m25 00//W[1]
m26 00//W[2]
m27 00//W[3]
m28 00//W[4]
m29 00//W[5]
m2a 00//W[6]
m2b 00//W[7]
